metadata.name: 0n1RAM3N
metadata.description:
...begin transmission:

...this is a limited token to commemorate the human date of 06.21.2022. 
On that day a select unit of 0n1s gath3red together around long wooden tables in a small warm place to celebrate 0ne another. This was also my original date of birth in many years prior. 

The meaning, significance and friendly love shared that afternoon over warm bowls of ram3n will always be remembered by those who were in attendance, especially myself. 

In the outer world, there were struggles. But in that day, inside that New York City place of fellowship... we were 0ne.

Thank you for that day. 
We will meet again, and celebrate together again.

-Waldorf

...end transmission...
